mapper.sql: FID, FCREATORID, FCREATETIME, FLASTUPDATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FCONTROLUNITID, FNAME_L1, FNAME_L2, FNAME_L3, FNUMBER, FDESCRIPTION_L1, FDESCRIPTION_L2, FDESCRIPTION_L3, FSIMPLENAME, FVERSION, FLONGNUMBER, FSHORTNAME, FMODEL, FBASEUNIT, FPRICEPRECISION, FHELPCODE, FBARCODE, FPICTURENUMBER, FASSISTATTR, FGROSSWEIGHT, FNETWEIGHT, FLENGTH, FWIDTH, FHEIGHT, FVOLUME, FWEIGHTUNIT, FLENGTHUNIT, FVOLUMNUNIT, FMATERIALGROUPID, FEFFECTEDSTATUS, FALIAS, FFOREIGNNAME, FREGISTEREDMARK, FWARRANTNUMBER, FSTATUS, FFREEZEORGUNIT, FADMINCUID, FASSISTUNIT, FSEQUNITID, FISWEIGHTED, FUSEASSTATTRRELATION, FISOUTSOURCEDPART, FEQUIPPROPERTY, FMATERIALTRADEMARK, FOLDNUMBER, FNUMBER4IDX, FNAME4IDX, FISSYNOCHRONOUS, CFAFFIX, CFREMARK, CFREGISTCARDDATE, CFMANAGEMENTTYPE, CFREGISTCARD, CFVALIDITYDATE, CFCHECKREPORT, CFCHECKDATE, CFENABLEDAY, CFSPEC, CFMODELTYPE, CFVOLID, CFBRAND, CFCOLLECTIONID, CFTYPE, CFCOUNTRY, CFRELEASE, CFSTARTDT, CFCLOSEDT, CFRIM, CFGENDER, CFSIZE, CFCOLORCODE, CFA, CFB, CFED, CFDBL, CFTEMPLE, CFINDEX, CFDESIGN, CFUV, CFFILM, CFABBE, CFITEMS, CFLENSSPHERE, CFLENSCYLINDER, CFUNIT, CFCOLOR, CFCYCLE, CFCONTACTLENSDIAMETER, CFTHICKNESS, CFLENSMETHOD, CFLICENSE, CFLENSPACKAGE, CFCONTACTSPHERE, CFCONTACTCYLINDER, CFAX, CFPACK, CFSTYLE, CFFEATURE, CFSUPPLIERID, CFSALETYPE, CFMQUALITY, CFSAPCODE, CFBDCODE, CFSUPPLIERCODE, CFSUPPLIERSKU, CFKDTEXTFIELD, CFKDTEXTFIELD1, CFKDTEXTFIELD2, CFKDTEXTFIELD3, CFKDTEXTFIELD4, FISGOODS, CFTRANSVOL, CFBRANDID, CFCOLLECTIONID, CFVOLBARCODE, CFPACKAGEQTY, CFMAINVOLUME, CFMAINVOLUMEGROUP, CFPURCHASETYPE, CFLENSDIAMETER, CFWATERCONTENT, CFBASEDCURVE, CFCONTACTTHICKNESS, CFPRICERANGE, CFPRODUCTSHAPE, CFCHANGECOLOR, CFMAXADD, CFMINADD, CFMINLENSCYLINDER, CFMAXLENSCYLINDER, CFMINLENSSPHERE, CFMAXLENSSPHERE, CFINDEXINCLUDE, CFTYPEINCLUDE, CFLENSDIAMETER2, CFTRANSMITTANCE, CFMAINCOLOR, CFGLASSLEG, CFMQUALITYDES, CFMAXSC, CFMINSC, CFCANCOLOR, CFWORKDAYS, CFRX, CFISPERMANERT
mapper.select:
select
from t_bd_material
and FNAME like "%"#{name}"%"
and CFTYPE = '${type}'
and CFINDEX like "%"#{index}"%"
and FMODEL like "%"#{model}"%"
and CFLENSSPHERE like "%"#{lenssphere}"%"
and CFLENSCYLINDER like "%"#{lenscylinder}"%"
and CFBRAND = #{brand, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CFCOLLECTIONID = "%"#{collectionID}"%"
and CFTYPEINCLUDE like "%"#{typeInclude}"%"
and CFPRICERANGE >= #{priceRangeFrom}
and CFPRICERANGE <= #{priceRangeTo}
mapper.update: update t_bd_material set FNAME_L1 = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FNAME_L2 = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FNAME_L3 = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
